languages.text: "Возмутительное коварство. Предполагаю, что богохульные твари с этого корабля не способны поднять "Странник в пустоши" с поверхности. Неудивительно — старые и изношенные транспорты часто отправляют в один конец, чтобы, после приземления на поверхность колонии, они стали ее центром, а судовой реактор — энергетическим сердцем нового поселения".

"Outrageous perfidy. I assume the ungodly creatures from this ship are unable to raise the Wasteland Wayfarer from the surface. Hardly surprising, the most old and worn-down transports are often sent on one-ways trips so they can then become the centre of the fledging colony after landing, and their reactor — the energy core of the new settlement."
languages.original_text: "Возмутительное коварство. Предполагаю, что богохульные твари с этого корабля не способны поднять "Странник в пустоши" с поверхности. Неудивительно — старые и изношенные транспорты часто отправляют в один конец, чтобы, после приземления на поверхность колонии, они стали ее центром, а судовой реактор — энергетическим сердцем нового поселения".

traits.locale_text: "Outrageous perfidy. I assume the ungodly creatures from this ship are unable to raise the Void Wanderer from the surface. Hardly surprising, the old and worn down transports are often sent on a one way trip so they can become the centre of the fledging colony after landing, and their reactor — the energy heart of the new settlement."

"Outrageous perfidy. I assume the ungodly creatures from this ship are unable to raise the Void Wanderer from the surface. Hardly surprising, the old and worn down transports are often sent on a one way trip so they can become the centre of the fledging colony after landing, and their reactor — the energy heart of the new settlement."

"Outrageous perfidy. I assume the ungodly creatures from this ship are unable to raise the ‘Wasteland Wayfarer' from the surface. Hardly surprising, the most old and worn-down transports are often sent on one-ways trips so they can then become the centre of the fledging colony after landing, and their reactor — the energy core of the new settlement."

"Outrageous perfidy. I assume the ungodly creatures from this ship are unable to raise the Wasteland Wayfarer from the surface. Hardly surprising, the most old and worn-down transports are often sent on one-ways trips so they can then become the centre of the fledging colony after landing, and their reactor — the energy core of the new settlement."

"Outrageous perfidy. I assume the ungodly creatures from this ship are unable to raise the Wasteland Wayfarer from the surface. Hardly surprising, the most old and worn-down transports are often sent on one-ways trips so they can then become the centre of the fledging colony after landing, and their reactor — the energy core of the new settlement."

languages.text: « C'est le comble de l'infamie ! Je présume que ces créatures impies sont incapables de faire redécoller le "Défricheur". Ça ne me surprend guère, ces transporteurs antiques et usés jusqu'à la corde partent souvent pour un voyage sans retour jusqu'à une planète inhabitée, où ils deviennent le centre d'une nouvelle colonie qui exploitera l'énergie de son réacteur. »
languages.original_text: "Outrageous perfidy. I assume the ungodly creatures from this ship are unable to raise the Wasteland Wayfarer from the surface. Hardly surprising, the most old and worn-down transports are often sent on one-ways trips so they can then become the centre of the fledging colony after landing, and their reactor — the energy core of the new settlement."

traits.locale_text: « C'est le comble de l'infamie ! Je présume que ces créatures impies sont incapables de faire redécoller le "Défricheur". Ça ne me surprend guère, ces transporteurs antiques et usés jusqu'à la corde partent souvent pour un voyage sans retour jusqu'à une planète inhabitée, où ils deviennent le centre d'une nouvelle colonie qui exploitera l'énergie de son réacteur. »

languages.text: “真是令人发指的背叛行为，我猜那艘飞船上的邪恶生物没能让‘荒野旅人号’飞起来。这并不奇怪，因为那些最陈旧、最破旧的运输船，到最后通常会踏上一场有去无回的旅程。着陆之后，飞船本身就会成为新生殖民地的中心，而飞船的反应堆就会成为新定居点的能源核心。
languages.original_text: "Outrageous perfidy. I assume the ungodly creatures from this ship are unable to raise the Wasteland Wayfarer from the surface. Hardly surprising, the most old and worn-down transports are often sent on one-ways trips so they can then become the centre of the fledging colony after landing, and their reactor — the energy core of the new settlement."

traits.locale_text: “真是令人发指的背叛行为，我猜那艘飞船上的邪恶生物没能让‘荒野旅人号’飞起来。这并不奇怪，因为那些最陈旧、最破旧的运输船，到最后通常会踏上一场有去无回的旅程。着陆之后，飞船本身就会成为新生殖民地的中心，而飞船的反应堆就会成为新定居点的能源核心。

languages.text: "Schändliche Niedertracht. Ich gehe davon aus, dass die gottlosen Kreaturen von diesem Schiff nicht in der Lage sind, die Wasteland Wayfarer von der Oberfläche zu bergen. Es dürfte nicht überraschen, dass oft die ältesten und ramponiertesten Transporter auf Reisen ohne Wiederkehr geschickt werden, um nach der Landung zum Zentrum der jungen Kolonie zu werden. Ihr Reaktor wird dann zum Energiekern der neuen Siedlung."
languages.original_text: "Outrageous perfidy. I assume the ungodly creatures from this ship are unable to raise the Wasteland Wayfarer from the surface. Hardly surprising, the most old and worn-down transports are often sent on one-ways trips so they can then become the centre of the fledging colony after landing, and their reactor — the energy core of the new settlement."

traits.locale_text: "Schändliche Niedertracht. Ich gehe davon aus, dass die gottlosen Kreaturen von diesem Schiff nicht in der Lage sind, die Wasteland Wayfarer von der Oberfläche zu bergen. Es dürfte nicht überraschen, dass oft die ältesten und ramponiertesten Transporter auf Reisen ohne Wiederkehr geschickt werden, um nach der Landung zum Zentrum der jungen Kolonie zu werden. Ihr Reaktor wird dann zum Energiekern der neuen Siedlung."

languages.text: «Es una traición absoluta. Supongo que las impías criaturas de esta nave son incapaces de sacar el "Caminante de los Páramos" de la superficie. No me sorprende. Los transportes más antiguos y desgastados se suelen enviar a viajes de un solo sentido para luego actuar como el centro de la nueva colonia tras el aterrizaje. Su reactor, por otro lado, sirve como el núcleo energético del asentamiento».
languages.original_text: "Outrageous perfidy. I assume the ungodly creatures from this ship are unable to raise the Wasteland Wayfarer from the surface. Hardly surprising, the most old and worn-down transports are often sent on one-ways trips so they can then become the centre of the fledging colony after landing, and their reactor — the energy core of the new settlement."

traits.locale_text: «Es una traición absoluta. Supongo que las impías criaturas de esta nave son incapaces de sacar el "Caminante de los Páramos" de la superficie. No me sorprende. Los transportes más antiguos y desgastados se suelen enviar a viajes de un solo sentido para luego actuar como el centro de la nueva colonia tras el aterrizaje. Su reactor, por otro lado, sirve como el núcleo energético del asentamiento».

languages.text: 「なんという裏切り行為でしょう。この船の悪しき生物は『ウェイストランド・ウェイフェアラー号』を地上から引き上げることはできないと思われます。当然と言えば当然ですが、古びて傷の多い輸送船はほとんどが片道旅行で、到着後は出来始めのコロニーの中心に入り、そのリアクター…つまり新たな居住地のエネルギーコアになります」
languages.original_text: "Outrageous perfidy. I assume the ungodly creatures from this ship are unable to raise the Wasteland Wayfarer from the surface. Hardly surprising, the most old and worn-down transports are often sent on one-ways trips so they can then become the centre of the fledging colony after landing, and their reactor — the energy core of the new settlement."

traits.locale_text: 「なんという裏切り行為でしょう。この船の悪しき生物は『ウェイストランド・ウェイフェアラー号』を地上から引き上げることはできないと思われます。当然と言えば当然ですが、古びて傷の多い輸送船はほとんどが片道旅行で、到着後は出来始めのコロニーの中心に入り、そのリアクター…つまり新たな居住地のエネルギーコアになります」

languages.text: "Ölçüsüz bir kahpelik. Bu gemideki tanrı tanımaz yaratıkların Çorak Diyar Yolcusu'nu yüzeyden kaldıramayacağını varsayıyorum. Şaşırtıcı değil. Çoğu eski ve yıpranmış taşıt, geri dönüşü olmayan yolculuklara gönderilir ki iniş yaptıklarında taze kurulmuş kolonilerin merkezi olabilsinler, reaktörleri de yeni yerleşim yerinin enerji çekirdeği görevi görebilsin."
languages.original_text: "Outrageous perfidy. I assume the ungodly creatures from this ship are unable to raise the Wasteland Wayfarer from the surface. Hardly surprising, the most old and worn-down transports are often sent on one-ways trips so they can then become the centre of the fledging colony after landing, and their reactor — the energy core of the new settlement."
